channel.title: [317] Adding Shops?
channel.description:
How do I add shops to my staff area and edit what ppl sell in sohps?
Please help thanks in advance :))

item.title: [317] Adding Shops?
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

Ok,

start with your NPC
im gonna use my flecthing shop as an example, all the ID’s will be the same.

i’ve got NPC number 530.
open your autospawn.cfg and add this code

 spawn = 530             CO-ORD X               CO-ORD Y            0               0             0             0              0               1                     Fletching

make sure you use tab spaces and dont actually press the space bar.
this code puts the npc where you want it.
save and close this file.

Open client.java and search for case 17:

and if you scroll down a little, you will see names of shops and you need to put this code after the } so it will look like this

} else if (NPCID == 530) {
      PutNPCCoords = true;
      wanneShop = 59;
}

this gives you the shop ID which you need later.
save and close client.java

Open npcspeech.cfg and add this code

speech = 530                20                 1                     Fletching shop

the 20 is the speed at which it is said. have it too fast and it may lag your server.
save and close this file.

now finally open shops.cfg
remember the shop ID we entered in client.java?
you need it here

now add this code.

shop = 59             Fletching shop           2                     2               //THEN YOU PUT YOUR ITEM ID'S HERE PUT A TAB SPACE THEN THE AMOUNT OF ITEMS IN THE STORE AND REPEAT FOR THE ITEMS YOU WANT IN THE SHOP.

this should fix your problem.
if you need help with item pricing or antyhnig else im glad to help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 16, 2009, 08:22:27 pm[/size][hr]oh i forgot one thing.
after you do all that, compile and restart your server

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Adding Shops?
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

Siccc:

Alright this will be simple. Like everyone above me has said get the npc id you want. Go to shops.cfg annd search for a npc id that already exists copy its code and paste it under it then change its npc id and coords to the ones you want. To make it tradeable go to client.java And do the same thing as above but change the items you want and the prices. Once you see the items and prices in the shop its really easy to change to the ones you want. Sorry if this was sloppy. If you need me to re type and add codes and such in I will.

your wrong there.

prices of items is in item.cfg not in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Adding Shops?
item.dc:creator: @mages_pk_god mages pk god
item.description:
@mages_pk_god wrote:

sharecode:

To Add shops there should be a folder inside your source folder called shopmaker if not then idk to edit wat npcs says find “Npchandler” right click it and do edit then do ctrl+f and type in the npc’s id number that u want to change wat they say

if u read it properly u would have seen he didnt ask how to edit npc text dumbass…

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Adding Shops?
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

to edit what your shops sell, thats in shops.cfg
make sure you have the correct npc though.

and as for puttin npc’s in your staff area.
get the shop npc you want, and put it in your npc.cfg at the co-ords you want

as for allowing you to trade it you gotta add something to client.java
not sure what it is though
